select a.branchname, a.deptname, a.paydate, a.conname, a.address, a.conm2, a.conpy, a.kname, a.payername, a.payerid, a.payamt, a.taxincome, a.taxlocal, (a.taxincome + a.taxlocal) as tottax, (a.payamt - (a.taxincome + a.taxlocal)) as deductamt from ( select t1.payseq, (select branchname from ba_branchmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode) as branchname, (select deptname from ba_deptmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode and deptcode = t1.deptcode) as deptname, t1.paydate, (select conname from sa_salemst where buyid = t1.saleid) as conname, (select address from mm_buymst where buyid = (select saleid from sa_salemst where saleid = t1.saleid)) as address, (select conm2 from sa_salemst where buyid = t1.saleid) as conm2, (select conpy from sa_salemst where buyid = t1.saleid) as conpy, (select kname from hr_insamst where insacode = t1.insacode) as kname, t2.payername, t2.payerid, t2.payamt, t2.taxincome, t2.taxlocal from sa_sudangmst t1, sa_sudangpayertb t2, (select insacode from hr_insamst where 1=1
and kname = #S_KNAME#
) t3 where 1=1
and t1.paydate = #S_PAYDATE#
and t1.branchcode = #S_BRANCHCODE#
and t1.deptcode = #S_DEPTCODE#
and t1.insacode = t3.insacode and t1.saleid = t2.saleid and t1.payseq = t2.payseq order by payseq ) a

select a.branchname, a.deptname, a.paydate, a.conname, a.address, a.conm2, a.conpy, a.kname, a.saupowner, a.payerid, a.payamt, (a.payamt - a.supplytax) as supplyamt, a.supplytax, a.supplytax2, a.deductamt from ( select t1.payseq, (select branchname from ba_branchmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode) as branchname, (select deptname from ba_deptmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode and deptcode = t1.deptcode) as deptname, t1.paydate, (select conname from sa_salemst where buyid = t1.saleid) as conname, (select address from mm_buymst where buyid = (select saleid from sa_salemst where saleid = t1.saleid)) as address, (select conm2 from sa_salemst where buyid = t1.saleid) as conm2, (select conpy from sa_salemst where buyid = t1.saleid) as conpy, (select kname from hr_insamst where insacode = t1.insacode) as kname, t2.saupowner, t2.payerid, t2.payamt, t2.supplytax, '' as supplytax2, t2.deductamt from sa_sudangmst t1, sa_sudangpayertb t2, (select insacode from hr_insamst where 1=1
and kname = #S_KNAME#
) t3 where 1=1
and t1.paydate = #S_PAYDATE#
and t1.branchcode = #S_BRANCHCODE#
and t1.deptcode = #S_DEPTCODE#
and t1.insacode = t3.insacode and t1.saleid = t2.saleid and t1.payseq = t2.payseq order by payseq ) a
